title: Breakfast at Tiffany's Fonts
content:
Hello all,

I was hoping someone could help me identify the 2 fonts in the below image (the script and the serif below it). Thanks so much in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [breakfast tiffanys.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225002915/http:/typophile.com/files/breakfast%20tiffanys.jpg) | 50.73 KB |
author: ilanae

comments.content:
I think the script is Palace Script. The serif is a vertically stretched Bodoni?

--- Tamas Ferencz ---
I thought it was some form of Bodoni, but I wasn't sure. Thanks so much for your help!
